Html:
I have a site with structure like

  • Root node 1
    • Client 1's node
      • Content of client 1
    • Client 2's node
      • Content of client 2
    • Client 3's node
      • Content of client 3
  • Root node 2
    • Some other client's nodes

From the structure you can see each client has own node, so when user visits each client's content and performs search I would like to restrict the search result within the client's node.

Is it possible?

Thanks
